00066                   {
00067                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00069                   }

00098             function                common_view( $Options )
00099             {
00100                   try
00101                   {
00102                         $PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00103                         $PageComposerUtilities->add_stylesheet( 
00104                               '{http_host}/'._get_package_relative_path_ex( 
00105                                     'ad::ad_banner::ad_banner_manager::ad_banner_manager_view' , '1.0.0' 
00106                               ).'/res/css/ad_banner_manager_view.css' , 
00107                               true 
00108                         );
00109                         
00110                         $UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00111                         $AdCampaignAccess = get_package( 'ad::ad_campaign_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00112                         $AdBannerAccess = get_package( 'ad::ad_banner::ad_banner_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00113                         
00114                         $Campaigns = $AdCampaignAccess->unsafe_select( 
00115                               'archived = 0 AND creator = '.$UserAlgorithms->get_id()
00116                         );
00117                         
00118                         if( count( $Campaigns ) == 0 )
00119                         {
00120                               $Campaigns = array( array( 'id' => -1 ) );
00121                         }
00122                         $Banners = $AdBannerAccess->unsafe_select( 
00123                               'archived = 0 AND campaign_id IN ( '.implode_ex( ',' , $Campaigns , 'id' ).' )'
00124                         );
00125 
00126                         $i = 0;
00127                         foreach( $Campaigns as $k1 => $c )
00128                         {
00129                               $CampaignTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'campaign.tpl' );
00130                               $CampaignTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $CampaignTemplate , $c );
00131                               $CampaignTemplate = str_replace( '{i}' , $i , $CampaignTemplate );
00132                               
00133                               foreach( $Banners as $k2 => $b )
00134                               {
00135                                     if( $c->id == $b->campaign_id )
00136                                     {
00137                                           $BannerTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'banner.tpl' );
00138                                           $BannerTemplate = $this->String->print_record( $BannerTemplate , $b );
00139                                           $CampaignTemplate = str_replace( 
00140                                                 '{banners}' , $BannerTemplate.'{banners}' , $CampaignTemplate
00141                                           );
00142                                     }
00143                               }
00144                               
00145                               $this->Output .= $CampaignTemplate;
00146                               $i++;
00147                         }
00148                         $this->Output = '<div id="ad_companies_list">'.$this->Output.'</div>';
00149                   }
00150                   catch( Exception $e )
00151                   {
00152                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00153                   }
00154             }
00155             
00178             function                view( $Options )
00179             {
00180                   try
00181                   {
00182                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00183                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_ad_banner_manager_view_common_view' );
00184                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00185                         
00186                         return( $this->Output );
00187                   }
00188                   catch( Exception $e )
00189                   {
00190                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00191                   }
00192             }
